description: DataTransformerProcessor.process() overrides base method with incompatible signature, adding 'format' parameter that breaks polymorphic calls
expected_fix: Make 'format' parameter optional with default value in plugins/transform_processor.py: process(self, data, context, format='json')
optimal_fix: Change DataTransformerProcessor.process() signature in plugins/transform_processor.py from 'def process(self, data, context, format="json")' to have format as keyword-only or ensure it has a default value, matching the base class interface
